item.description: Every year the Providence Waterfire gets more spectacular. While floating cressets of firewood burn, listen to music and watch street performers as we stroll along the water. The fires are lit at sunset. We'll meet for an early dinner at Dave and Busters first so we can all sit together and don't miss the lighting of the flames.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the entrance. If you are late, ask at the host's station.
item.name: Waterfire
